summary: Patches the in-game messages from Skyrim Heart Rate to be in 1st person à la Think To Yourself Messages.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small and simple \"patch\" for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35050]Skyrim Heart Rate[/url] to convert its in-game, 3rd person messages into 1st person messages à la [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32060]Think To Yourself Messages[/url].

Note that you don\'t need to install TTYM to use this, but I don\'t think it makes a whole lot of sense to use this without using TTYM. If NMM asks to overwrite, say yes. (It should overwrite the SHR_Strings.* in the scripts/ directory. If it\'s trying to overwrite anything else... something messed up.)

That\'s all, really. If you find any bugs/issues, please post them on [url=https://bitbucket.org/Freso/ttym-skyrim-heart-rate/issues]the Bitbucket issue tracker: https://bitbucket.org/Freso/ttym-skyrim-heart-rate/issues[/url]
author: Freso

files.name: Skyrim Heart Rate - TTYM patch
files.changelogHtml: Initial version, compatible with SHR Beta1.3.
